entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
